name: Saving P.I.P.O.
description:
Saving P.I.P.O.

Saving P.I.P.O. (Plant In Pot Organism) is a grid-based, top-down single-player 2D puzzle game. The mysterious robot UBOT (Unregistered Botanical Organizer-T) finds itself the only thing that can save the helpless plants from death and despair.

Push the plant through the spaceship to the Rescue spot to save P.I.P.O.
Avoid dangerous fires in the treacherously small areas and move P.I.P.O. to safety.

How to play:

Control the player character UBOT with either WASD or the arrow keys

when you walked against an object, grab it with G or space and turn with Q and R

This game is produced by team pipo. a group in Uppsala University's Game Design program in the first year course arcade games.
